58217.「……ああ <pc>か。\n すまないのだが 魔幻宮殿の結界の調査は\n 暗礁に:
Oh, <pc>, it's you. Sorry to say,
but our investigation regarding the Demon
Palace's barrier... Well...

58218.「大魔王マデサゴーラの居城である\n 魔幻宮殿の結界を突破するためのカギとなる\:
The key to breaking through the barrier of
that wretched castle is the Legendary Flying
Steed, Pegasus...

58219.「今 そのペガサスの所在について\n 叡智の冠の賢者たちと 調べているのだが\n:
The Crown of Wisdom is currently searching for
its whereabouts, but there's just one
problem...

58220.「彼らが見つけてきた この古文書によると\n ペガサスは 先代勇者とともに 死力:
According to this ancient book, the Pegasus
and Hero of the past did everything in their
power to defeat the former Great Demon King.

58221.「そして ペガサスは そのキズをいやすため\n エテーネの島と呼ばれる場所で\n:
And that the Pegasus recovered from its wounds
on Ethene Island, still slumbering to this
day...

58222.「ネルゲルによる封印以来 エテーネの島は \n 周辺の海が荒れ いかなる船をもっ:
Since the island was sealed by Nergel's power,
the surrounding waters have become too
dangerous for any ships to approach.

58223.「海を渡っていく以外に\n エテーネの島へ たどりつく手段があれば\n 希望も見:
If there was another way to get there, then
we might have some hope...

58224.「お困りのようですね。: You seem to be in distress.

58225.「そなたは たしか……\n アンルシアが こちらの世界に戻った時\n ともにいた:
You must be... you were together with Anlucia
when she returned to this world...

58226.「お初に お目にかかります 賢者ルシェンダ様。\n 私は クロウズ。しがない 旅:
Nice to meet you, Lushenda. My name is Claws.
I am but a humble traveler.

58227.「そなたが クロウズか。話は聞いている。\n 姫が 偽のレンダーシアより 戻って:
So, you're Claws... I heard how you helped
Anlucia return here from the false Lendersia.

58228.「ふふ。昔話に 興味はありませんね。\n 今日は あなた方に\n お渡ししたいも:
Heh, heh. That's enough about me. I came to
give you some useful information.

58229.「エテーネの島に渡る方法を ひとつ……\n 私は 知っています。: I know a way to get to Ethene Island.

58232.「このグランゼドーラの 南東の地。\n ドラクロン山地という場所に\n 飛竜の巣:
Southeast of here, there is a nest of flying
dragons in a place called the Draklon
Mountains. Did you know that?

58233.「飛竜……。\n まさか これは 竜笛か！？:
Flying dragons... Then this...
This is a dragon's flute?!

58234.「ご明察。さすがは 賢者ルシェンダ様。\n 私の解説など 不要でしたか。:
Indeed. Seems you already knew, so I have no
need to explain.

58235.「あとは 煮るなり焼くなり ご自由に。\n それでは 私は これで。:
Do what you will with that information.
I'll leave you to it.

58236.「待てっ！ そなた これをどこで……: Wait! But where did you get this...

58237.「竜笛か……。\n まさか この目で見ることが かなうとはな。:
The dragon's flute... I thought I'd never
see one with my own eyes.

58238.「竜笛とは 人を乗せ 大空を舞う\n 飛竜を操るために作り出された 神秘の楽器。:
The dragon's flute is a mystical instrument
that can call forth a flying dragon to carry
you through the skies.

58239.「だが 太古の昔……アストルティアに まだ\n 竜族という種族がいた時代 竜笛を:
But, in ancient times, when the Nadravians
still inhabited Astoltia... the art of making
these flutes was lost to time.

58240.「その楽器を いとも たやすく\n 我らに与えた あのクロウズという若者。\n:
And then Claws just hands me one so
nonchalantly... what an enigmatic man he is...

58241.「まあよい。ともかく か細いながらも\n 希望の灯が ともったのだ。飛竜を得られ:
At any rate... we now have even the tiniest
glimmer of hope. If we can find a flying
dragon, we can reach the island from the sky.

58242.「<pc>。この竜笛を そなたにあずける。\n この笛を用いて 本当に 飛竜を\:
<pc>, take this with you. Maybe
you can actually beckon a dragon using it.

58243.「クロウズを疑うわけではないが なにせ\n 太古の昔の話だからな。どのような結果:
Not that I doubt Claws, but it's a story from
so long ago. I'm not sure what will happen,
but... will you still do it?

58244.「うむ。飛竜の巣がある ドラクロン山地は\n グランゼドーラ領から行ける ロヴォ:
Good. The Draklon Mountains are located in the
Rovos Highlands to the south. I shall have
arrangements made to open the gate.

58245.「まずは ドラクロン山地に向かい\n なんとかして 飛竜を手なずける方法の\n:
Once there, find any clues you can on how to
tame one of those flying dragons.

58246.「では この竜笛を そなたに託そう。\n 頼んだぞ <pc>よ。:
I'll entrust this flute to you. I'm counting
on you, <pc>.

58247.<pc>は 賢者ルシェンダから\n竜笛（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me_6:
<pc> received
the Dragon's Flute (Key Item) from
Sage Lushenda!<me_60>

58248.「ふむ。その返事は うれしいが\n どうやら そなたは 他の者の依頼を\n ずい:
Mhm. While I am happy to hear that, I seems
you are too busy with other requests at the
moment.

58249.「できるだけ 速やかに 手を空け\n 私からの依頼を 聞いてほしい。:
Once you've freed up more of your requests,
please come back and see me.

58250.「むずかしい依頼だとは わかっているが\n その言葉だけは 聞きたくなかったぞ。:
I know it's a difficult request, but I'd
expect a better attitude from someone who's
an ally of the Hero.

58251.「もう一度 おのれの使命がなんであるか\n 自分の胸に聞いてみることだ。\n そ:
I'll ask you once again... will you do it?
I'll be waiting patiently for your answer.

64194.「ひさしぶりに 竜笛の音を聞いたが\n あまりに ひどい音色……。:
I haven't heard that sound in ages...
What a terrible tone, though...

64195.「どんな者が吹いたのかと思って\n 見にきてみれば まさか <cs_pchero:
Was it you who played that sound,
<cs_pchero_race>?

64196.「下等種族の <cs_pchero_race>風情が\n 飛竜を従えようとは 片:
Disgusting that such a lowly <cs_pchero_race>
has tried calling a flying dragon.

64197.「誇り高き 飛竜が従うは\n 選ばれし民 竜族のみ！:
We proud dragons of the skies only beckon
to the Dragon people!

64198.「恥知らずにも 飛竜の峰に\n 足を踏み入れた おのれの愚かさを呪うがいい！:
Now, you shall pay with your foolishness of
trespassing here!

64200.「こりずに また来たのか <cs_pchero_race>め。\n 浅ましく つ:
You don't know when to quit, do you, <cs_pchero_race>?
Your flute's sound is shameful and inept.

64201.「だが 何度来ようと 同じこと。\n 誇り高き 飛竜が従うは\n 選ばれし民 竜:
But no matter how many times you come, the
outcome changes not. We only beckon to the
Dragon people!

64202.「恥知らずにも 飛竜の峰に\n 足を踏み入れた おのれの愚かさを呪うがいい！:
Now, you shall pay with your foolishness of
trespassing here!

64204.「そのチカラ……。\n 貴様 ただの<cs_pchero_race>ではないな。:
Such strength... and from such a pitiful
<cs_pchero_race>?

64205.「……面白い。気が変わったわ。\n 貴様に 飛竜を与えてやるとしよう。:
How interesting... I've changed my mind about
you. I will give you what you seek.

64206.「とはいえ その つたない笛の音では\n 成長した飛竜を従えることなど\n 到底:
However, your flute playing skills are quite
poor. They will not beckon a fully grown
dragon.

64207.「生まれたばかりの 純粋無垢な飛竜であれば\n 貴様の その つたない笛の音色に:
A newborn dragon won't know any better, so it
will most likely respond... regardless of how
terrible your playing sounds.

64208.「……山のふもとに住む 竜守りのもとへ行け。\n いいものを届けておいてやる。:
Speak to the Dragon Guard at the foot of the
mountain. He will have what you desire.

64209.「二度と この地で 竜笛を吹いてくれるなよ。\n 貴様の笛の音は あまりに耳障り:
Never play that flute in these lands again.
Your sound is deafeningly loud...

64210.「さっきなぁ 真っ白くて でぇっかい竜が\n 山のふもとに降りてきなすってよ……:
A few minutes ago, a huge white dragon flew
down this way...

64211.「ワスの小屋の前に こいつを置いてったのよお。:
And then he left this here in front of my
hut...

64212.「あんな 立派な竜を見たの はずめてでさあ。\n ありゃあ きっと 竜の王様にち:
I've never seen such a magnificent dragon
before... must've been the Dragon King.

64213.「しっかし なんだって\n ワスの小屋に タマゴなんか……:
Why the heck is there a giant egg in my hut,
I wonder...

64214.「……ってぇ <pc>！\n このタマゴは お前さんのだってえ！？: What?! You're sayin' this egg is yours?!

64215.「ほうほう。そんなことが……。\n 飛竜の峰で 竜笛を吹いたら\n あの 竜の王:
Hohoho, I see... so when you played your flute
at Dragon Peak, the Dragon King showed
himself.

64216.「それで 純粋無垢な飛竜をくれると言って\n 来てみたら このタマゴがあったと…:
And then he said he'd give you this newborn
dragon... then I came in here, and found this
egg...

64217.「こりゃあ とんでもねぇことだぞお！\n 竜が タマゴをくれるなんて 前代未聞だ:
This is nuts! A dragon giving out one of its
eggs is unheard of! And from the Dragon
King, no less!

64218.「何はともあれ そういうことなら\n タマゴをかえす方法を ちゃあんと\n 思い:
Well, anyways... if that's really the case,
then we better get this thing hatched!

64219.「ちょ…ちょおっと 待っててくんろぉー。\n 今 全身全霊で 知恵ふりしぼって\:
Wait juuuust a minute... Let me just wrack my
brain so I can remember...

64220.「ん～と ん～とぉ……。\n 飛竜のタマゴをかえすには……:
Ummm... Hmm...
How to hatch a dragon's egg...

64221.「……っとぉ そうだぁ！ 思いだしただぁ！\n 飛竜のタマゴにゃ 竜炎石だあ！:
Oh, right! I got it! You need Dragonstones to
hatch 'em!

64222.「いいかぁ <pc>。\n ワスら竜守りは 飛竜のタマゴをかえす時\n 竜炎石っ:
Listen up. Me and the other Dragon Guards
used to use a stone called a Dragonstone to
hatch dragon eggs.

64223.「竜炎石は その名の通り 竜の炎を宿す石。\n 飛竜の炎を浴びた 山の岩肌が 崩:
They're powerful stones that contain the
essence of a dragon's flame. You can find 'em
scattered around these mountains.

64224.「ただ 竜炎石は １個じゃ足りませんでのう。\n ドラクロン山地の キラキラして:
However... just one won't be enough. Check
the shiny spots around the mountains and get
five of 'em for me.

64225.「ワスは 外で 待っとりますからなあ。\n 竜炎石が ５個 集まったら\n また:
I'll be waiting for you outside. Come see me
again once you've found five Dragonstones.

64226.「はぁー <pc>。\n どうしたあ タマゴの様子を見にきたんかあ？: Huh? What's wrong? Came to check on the egg?

64227.「ほ～れ。心配せずとも\n 飛竜のタマゴは この通り ここにありまさあ。:
Hey, don't worry. This egg isn't going
anywhere.

64228.「まぁ 子を思う 親心も わかりますがなあ。\n 一刻も早く タマゴをかえしたか:
I understand a parent's concern for their
child... but if you want the egg to hatch, go
fetch me some Dragonstones.

64229.「ワスは 外で 待っとりますからなあ。\n 竜炎石が ５個 集まったら\n また:
I'll be waiting for you outside. Come see me
again once you've found five Dragonstones.

64230.「……飛竜は 気性の荒い 生き物。\n 同じ飛竜同士で ケンカすることも多いでな:
Flying dragons are temperamental creatures.
They often fight with each other and scare
their opponents by breathing fire.

64231.「竜炎石は その炎を 何十年も何百年も浴びて\n 熱をたくわえ できた石……。そ:
Dragonstones are stones that that've formed
by heat for decades, even centuries... They
remind the newborn of its mother.

64232.「だが 竜炎石のすごさは それだけじゃねえ。\n この石で温められたタマゴは み:
But that's not all they can do... dragon eggs
heated by Dragonstones will cause the dragon
inside to grow quite quickly...

64233.「……ってぇ 言ってるそばから\n 来よる！ 来よるぞい！\n お前さんの飛竜の:
...and right on cue, look! It's hatching! Your
egg's hatching!!

64234.「ほっほっほ。ちゃんと お前さんを\n 親とすて 認めてくれたようですのう。\n:
Hohoho! It seems they've already realized
you're its parent. Your own flying dragon!

64235.「竜炎石で生まれた飛竜は すぐに\n 人を乗せて 飛べるそうですからなあ。\n:
I heard that a dragon born from Dragonstones
is already capable of having a rider. Now
you can fly around in the sky!

64236.「だども その前に この飛竜に\n 名前を付けてやらんと いけませんのう。\n:
Before that, let's give them a name. Make
sure to give them a name that truly fits!
Something cool, maybe?

64242.「ふむ！ <pc_hiryu>か！\n こそばゆくって いい名前ですのう！\n:
Ah! So you chose <pc_hiryu>?
It's got a nice ring to it! You sure got a
knack for choosin' names!

69927.「聞いたか！？ <pc_hiryu>！\n 今日から お前さんは <pc_hir:
Hear that? From this day forward, your name
will be <pc_hiryu>!

69928.「ほっほっほっほーっ！\n 生まれて いきなり あのように空を舞うとは\n なん:
Hohohoho! What a spirited young dragon, to be
born so suddenly and soar around like that!

69929.「さあて ここからが 本番ですぞお。\n ま ならうよりなれろと 言いますからな:
And now for the hard part. They say practice
makes perfect, so... first thing you'll wanna
do is use that flute of yours.

69930.「んだば だいじなものから 竜笛を使って\n <pc_hiryu>を呼んでみてく:
So go ahead and call <pc_hiryu> using
the Flute in your Key Items. I'll be watching
from here.

87376.「ルシェンダ様から 話は聞いたわ。\n エテーネの島に渡るために\n 飛竜を探し:
I heard from Lushenda that you were trying to
find a flying dragon so you could fly to
Ethene Island.

87377.「<pc>。どうだ？\n 飛竜を見つけることができたか？<yesno><clos:
Well, <pc>? Were you able to find
a flying dragon?<yesno><close>

87378.「ふふ。顔が にやけているぞ。\n まったく ウソをつくのが 下手なヤツだ。\n:
Heh, heh. I see that smirk. You can't fool
me. Now, tell me the truth.

87379.「……ふむ。飛竜の峰という場所に現れた\n 巨大な白き竜の導きのもと\n 飛竜を:
I see... so you received a flying dragon under
the guidance of a giant white dragon, who
appeared at a place called Dragon's Peak...

87380.「まったく おどろかされる話だが\n とりあえず クロウズの持ってきた物は\n:
What an incredible story. It seems that what
Claws brought us really was a dragon's flute
after all...

87381.「とにかく そなたは よくやってくれた。\n さあ これは 今回の報酬だ。\n:
Anyway, you've done well once again. Please
accept this reward for your efforts.

87382.「これでエテーネの島に渡る準備は ととのった。\n そなたは 飛竜を駆り ペガサ:
We are now ready to fly to Ethene Island
where the legendary Pegasus still
sleeps.

87383.「手がかりは少ないが そなたなら きっと\n ペガサスを見つけてきてくれると信じ:
We don't have much information to go off of
right now... but I'm certain you'll find the
Pegasus! We're all counting on you!

87384.「飛竜を操って 大空を飛べるなんて\n 本当に すごいわ。:
How amazing it must be to be able ride a
dragon through the skies...

87385.「いよいよ 大魔王との決戦が近いのね。\n 一刻も早く ペガサスを見つけて 戻っ:
Finally, the decisive battle with the Great
Demon King is almost upon us. I know you
will find the Pegasus. You can do it!

98061.「竜笛を吹けば ちゃあんと <pc_hiryu>は\n お前さんのとこに 来るは:
Play your flute and <pc_hiryu> will
come. Blow it with confidence!

98062.「それから…… 竜守りに伝わる技は\n タマゴをかえす方法以外にも\n まだまだ:
Also... there are many more techniques we
Dragon Guards are handed down than just
hatching eggs.

98063.「がんばって 思いだしとくんで しばらくして\n <pc_hiryu>を 乗りこ:
Good luck out there while you're learning
how to ride! When you think you got it, come
and see me again!

98473.「エテーネの島は レンダーシアの内海……\n そのちょうど 真ん中の辺りにある。:
The island is right in the middle of
Lendersia's inland sea.

100194.「つたない笛の音を響かせるのは 何者だ……。:
Who is making such a terrible sound with that
flute...?
